duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee the Complaints and Grievances Specialists to ensure compliance with client regulatory requirements.
Monitor complaints, grievances, appeals, and Fair Hearing turnaround times to ensure compliance with client contracts daily.
Maintain open lines of communication between C&G and Customer Service by ensuring regular communication with the Customer Service Department.
Prepare Client Corrective Action Plans and ensure compliance.
Identify and communicate client expectations and regulatory requirements to ensure compliance with member and provider complaints and appeal letters.
Assist in the hiring process, including interviewing candidates.
Assist in the ongoing evaluation of departmental policies and procedures.
Assist in the preparation of performance and wage evaluations in accordance with company policy.
Ensure quality and accuracy of data for client audits.
Provide clear written correspondence at all times.
Perform accurate and on-time reporting on a monthly and quarterly basis.
Coordinate and implement appropriate strategies for motivating team members.
Conduct monthly staff meetings and quarterly department meetings.
Assist in the formal training of all new and existing team members.
Approve attendance and time off for all direct reports.
Maintain working relationships with plan contacts.
Attend regular meetings as needed.
Review/approve timesheets.
Adhere to DentaQuest business practices.
Other duties as assigned.

In accordance with DentaQuest’s Compliance Plan, employee must conduct DQ business in accordance with applicable laws, regulations, professional standards, and ethical standards and report potential compliance or ethical issues to the manager or DQ’s Compliance Officer.
